description: I. Serious further offence review, 28 May 2009. 50 p. II. An inspection of the management of offenders' risk of harm to others by London probation in: Greenwich and Lewisham, Hackney & Tower Hamlets, Merton, Sutton & Wandsworth, Brent, Barnet and Enfield, April 2009. Incl. appendices. 23 p. III. National Offender Management Service response to investigation, April 2009. 11 p. IV. Investigation into the issues arising from the serious further offence review: Dano Sonnex [DS] (d.o.b. 07/07/1985, age 23), 22 Jan 2009. 30 p. V. Potential learning for the criminal justice service following the arrest of Dano Sonnex, 2 April 2009. Incl. annexes. 22 p.
department: Ministry of Justice HM Inspectorate of Probation National Offender Management Service National Probation Service for England and Wales London Criminal Justice Board
